street_name: Access From Altair Close To Sheba Court
description:
Full planning application for development of Phase 1b of Meridian Water to provide new residential accommodation (Use Class C3), ground floor commercial floorspace (Use Class E(a, b, c, g)), leisure floorspace (Use Class E(d)) and medical centre (Use Class E(e)) across three buildings including ancillary areas to these uses, roads and footpaths, car and cycle parking provision, public open space including areas for play, landscaping and drainage; and areas of landscaping and open space for temporary and meanwhile uses; Submission of an Environmental Statement.
Detailed Description (for explanation purposes only) The proposed development comprises 676 residential units with a mix of 23 x studio flats, 313 x 1 bed flats, 260 x 2 bed flats, 79 x 3 bed flats and 1 x 4 bed flat (totalling 977 units across Phase 1 a whole); 2581sqm of commercial floorspace with building heights ranging from 4 to 30 storeys. (Observations to L.B. Enfield, their reference 20/03821/RM)
